General.Name: Maruwa Co Ltd
General.Description: Maruwa Co., Ltd. produces and sells ceramics and electronic parts in Japan. It offers ceramics, including ceramic substrates and fillers, metalized/multilayer ceramic substrates, and pressed ceramic products, as well as ceramic hermetic seals and SiC components; and electronic components/devices, such as antennas, EMC and RF components, inductors, and capacitors. The company also provides quartz glass products; and LED lighting products comprising LED modules and components. It offers its products for use in mobile and network, LED, automotive electronics, RF, power electronics, IT and consumer electronics, semiconductor equipment, medical, power electronics, 5G, and TIM and TPH applications, as well as insulation parts. The company was formerly known as Maruwa Ceramic Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Maruwa Co., Ltd. in 1999. Maruwa Co., Ltd. was incorporated in 1973 and is headquartered in Owariasahi, Japan.
